section.title: Introduction
section.p: The structue of the example configurations provided in has changed as follows:

ul.li: entry-scale-esx has been replaced by the hybrid model entry-scale-esx-kvm-vsa.
entry-scale-kvm-vsa-mml has been promoted from "tech-preview" status.
mid-scale has been promoted from "tech-preview" status and renamed mid-scale-kvm-vsa.
